abstract: Facebook confirmed that it has raised $1.5 billion in financing from Goldman Sachs and Russia’s Digital Sky Technologies, and that it plans to file public financial statements beginning next year.
snippet: Facebook confirmed that it has raised $1.5 billion in financing from Goldman Sachs and Russia’s Digital Sky Technologies, and that it plans to file public financial statements beginning next year.

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
